short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple WebExtension for skipping the "Save As" dialog when saving images, pages and links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an updated version of the "Just Save" extension ( https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/just-save/plaggkdohpgdahkidgjmbhafnbbacpno ), updated for Manifest v3.
